lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But no, seriously, don't do that. That's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still in front of a green screen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for being patient. We are up now, and let's dive into the announcements for the evening. We don't have a whole lot this week, but we have, let's see. Any updates as far as the merch is concerned?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The merchandises? Well, you know, we do have that amazing David Mack poster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I thought that was only a limited-release item, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is, actually, but it's available for three more weeks. The signed version is available for two more weeks. And since it is a limited-time release thing, if you know anybody that watches the show but is maybe way behind and they're not watching live, it would probably be nice to let them know about it, because I still get some messages about the Joe Mad poster that people can't get anymore. So it will be gone after this, so it's nice if they can get it, too. And we have the Scanlan tee, and we have our amazing Slayer's Take aprons. Slayer's Cake aprons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's talk about the Scanlan t-shirt a little more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have the amazing Scanlan concert tee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That asshole? No, we're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And, you know, a bunch of other t-shirts as well, and a whole bunch of other things. Go check out the shop on geekandsundry.com and you'll see all of the merchandise that's available.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. Also, a reminder, guys, the Tal'Dorei campaign guide's coming out at GenCon in August. Pre-orders go up, I believe, mid-July, and I think if you pre-order it, I think it's like five extra bucks or something like that, you get the PDF download immediately. All the information is on Green Ronin's website, so go check it out if you have any questions there, because they can answer them better than I can. I'm steeped in art approvals and everything right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The art is looking so good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's looking awesome. We've pulled in some-- we've got a lot of community artists that we pushed over towards Green Ronin, so they've been pulling people from the community, which makes me happy, because I want to get as many of you guys involved as possible in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As many of us as possible?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't draw for shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do some art.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was referring to the community, not you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam's art is really rare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Audio podcast, for people who want to save their data and listen on long drives.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who don't want to look at our faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't blame you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For no other reason than for those Sam Riegel advertisements at the beginning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we got that. And we have Wednesday Club.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Wednesday Club next week. I don't actually know what we're doing, because I haven't looked at the 30-plus messages in that text thread, because I've been working on a thing that I can't talk about yet that's going to be really, really great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin, I feel like most of the time you don't know what you're going to be talking about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are we going to-- yeah, we need a go-to. What was going to be our blanket go-to? I'm not sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Punisher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great Lakes Avengers

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Great Lakes Avengers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a big effort to bring back the What the--?! comics.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about the scientology graphic novels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't read those. Do they have those?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to be a guest on the show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apologies to all our scientology fans.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we just lost half the audience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. And Signal Boost?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeff Lewis. We announced it on Tuesday on Talks. Yeah, Jeff Lewis, still Jeff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. So, getting us up to speed as to what happened last time. Vox Machina had recently been visited by an old ally, Scanlan Shorthalt, who had spent the past year or so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An old ally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Hey. Building a reputation and a criminal ring in Ank'harel as a forging master in various types of furniture and accoutrements. And upon realizing through the aid of one his hired help, Lionel, or Chud. Chad? Chod. Whatever the various pronunciations were that came through. Discovered that there was a second sphere, apparently on some sort of pyramid-like ziggurat structure not far from Ank'harel. Upon you returning as Scanlan to notify the party, you all made your way to Ank'harel, briefly met with Kaylie, and saw a little bit of the setup that they've been building for the past year or so, and then made your way towards the Smouldercrown Mountains to the southeast of Ank'harel, where apparently this structure resides and this cult, that is apparently sacrificing objects of magical power towards this black sphere. So you made your way to the outskirts of this mountain, discovered that the entrance that was previously there had been collapsed, and discovered a new, carved entrance into the mountain, were beset by a few traps, made your way into a far corner, set up a mansion, and after dealing rather briskly with a cluster of undead that had built up on the outside of your entryway to your magnificent mansion, you made your way to the final chamber where the structure was residing. A number of cultists there were in the process of quickly, hastily throwing these objects to the top and then noticed that you had come as interlopers into this space. At which point you realized the head of cult, at least this group here at the top of the pyramid, was none other, seemingly, than Lady Delilah Briarwood.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No, no, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who then protected herself and two of her cult members beneath the veil of a Prismatic Wall in the shape of a sphere, and you did battle with a number of undead and other cultists and followers of the Whispered One that involved largely just throwing a bunch of them into the ceiling, including yourselves, thanks to a well-placed Reverse Gravity. Scanlan had darted past the Prismatic Wall with a clever use of Dimension Door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should've died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Vox Machina, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do next? What does the next step on this journey mean for us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm getting wicked deja-vu, brah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but really. What should we fucking do? Should we go through it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never seen that before.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Keyleth, for bringing me back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how much time has passed since the fight, but can Taryon cast Revivify on Doty still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that much time has passed, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty's gone again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you lose a second one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I came back to get him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's like iPhones, they just come out every so often.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Doty 6 is going to have a much better camera. It's going to have better voice recognition. You're really going to be happy with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could use the same funds to bring that Doty back, it would just take you the week in reconstruction anyway. But you're not losing that Doty. The other one, you unfortunately lost in the City of Dis, but this can be brought back at the same cost of a new one. So you're not having to reconstruct an entirely new Doty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Recycling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I have to get his body somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kind of want to collapse this cave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With us in it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not with us in it. I don't think we can destroy the ziggurat, but I think we can at least make it extremely difficult to find and get to, and make it very uncomfortable for anything that tries to come through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. That would be smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then we can't come through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have another entrance. We have the one in Whitestone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, though, this is an exit. Do you want the only exit to be in your basement? The only one? Or are there more of these places?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, does each portal go to the same place, or do they go to different parts?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We saw the spire in both images, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through your connecting with Sarenrae, the vision that you received through that portal seemed to be very similar to what Vex described seeing through her arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be the same portal or they could both be within view of the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm imagining a circle of spheres.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And both seem to suck magic in, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they do the same thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we'll have an easier time keeping track of what is coming in and out if we just have one to deal with as opposed to two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's assuming there's only two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a stupid idea to shoot another Oracle Arrow through this one and see if it looks the same?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if we have the option.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can try, but in Whitestone, there was at least a visual path toward the ball, but I don't think there is one here, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not within the radius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not within the magic orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's too tight a room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I like your idea, but I worry that we're upping the odds of-- Listen, we just found out that she's alive, or something. She's going to unleash some sort of fresh hell somewhere. We're upping the odds of it happening under your living room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. It's just, what if it happens in both places at once?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we collapse the one in Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's directly under the castle. We would have to maybe fill it with, I don't know. Submerge it or some such.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least try to block off the entrance to where they can't get out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there an underground water source near Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's acid pits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could try and flood it with acid.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we blocked off that entrance when we go inside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know there's three of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we block this one, and then we block the one in Whitestone, and then we just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Game over!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we win, then, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be able to get back in if we need to, we just want to make sure that no one can wander in and out of here without making a bit of a ruckus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there are three entrances that we know of, and we need to block all of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One's already blocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And one, do we know where it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's one up top that we heard about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much time do I have left on my wings? A lot, probably, like a half hour or 40 minutes? It wasn't that long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, actually, because when you used your wings outside, you guys came inside. Did you use your wings during the battle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you guys take a long rest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did, because we had the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. So by this conversation happening, the rummaging through the bodies, inspecting the vicinity, I'd say you maybe have 20 more minutes on your wings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, did we rummage through the bodies? Let's rummage through those bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, that's how you found the objects.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they rummage, Keyleth wants to test the radius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we found the objects on that cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did not actually rummage through the bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything on the bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that was high. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, okay. Over the next 15 or so minutes, as you go through and begin to gather the corpses, most of the skeletons out here that have armor on, it's old, rusted, destroyed, broken armor, and the weapons either fell apart in the battle against you or are just barely usable or functional at this point in time. Of the various cultists' bodies, the armor on the black guard that you were battling is a pretty nice-looking set of full plate. You also find similar symbols, these dark iron necklaces that you found on the previous cultists.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll take those. We can take the plate armor if there's room for it in the bag, and then see if it's actually magical outside of the field.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many of those necklaces have we found?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six necklaces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, and we already had two, so now all of us have one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can make room in the Bag of Holding for the armor, but I have to get rid of one of these two bodies. Does anybody object if I throw one of the bodies at the little black marble?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would kind of like to see that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I think that's a pretty good idea, but you have to remove it from the bag before you walk over to the marble.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to remove the body from the bag before you walk over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right, okay. So can I walk back to the fork?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remove them both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back to the fork. I pull out-- both? We only need one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pull one body out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes to save his bodies for later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, I'll run my store the way I run my store. I pull one body out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, just as a note, the visual of Grog pulling this body out of the Bag of Holding is much like trying to pull a Slim Jim out of the wrapper. It pulls weird and you have to yank.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What an analogy. The sausage without the casing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just really awkward and awful. But yeah, you manage to get the body out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Close the Bag of Holding and I just drag him back over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impacts) Up each step.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody ready? And a one, and a two, and a (whoosh).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you throw it, it impacts, and you watch as the body stops in mid-air from the gravity, stopping where it stands. Its legs fold over, and like a broken physics engine, you watch as the body (crackling) twists, cracks, and gets sucked in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's not do that. Let's not go through that hole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It really doesn't seem that bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kind of want to experiment. Would you mind losing one of the necklaces, or no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put a necklace on the other cadaver and then throw it through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I literally just walked all the way over there and now you want me to go back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You need the cardio, let's not pretend you don't. We're going to put one of the necklaces on the body and throw it through. It'll still be fun to watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk back out of the realm of the thing, pinching my belly fat because apparently Percy thinks I'm a couple pounds heavy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all that ale, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can only mock you on graph paper. I take what I can fucking get, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll pull the other Slim Jim out of the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (suction sound) You place one of the various symbols around its neck and then Babe Ruth-style lob it, and you watch as it gets within a certain proximity, the orb seems to shimmer and shift open ever so slightly. It's similar to what you saw, it opened to a mouthed gateway when Delilah and the other cultists walked through. The body still rattles, and you watch it twist a bit, but it's a far less impactful transition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, so now we have seven of those things, and we have to get eight of us through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's other options.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's the eighth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You and you, bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I live in Ank'harel and I'm a crime boss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and you're here with us now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're not planning on going with us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hadn't been invited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was pretty-- I mean, from a third party, non-influenced or partial perspective, flipping gravity was pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus, he's got a lot of big words now. You want to be around to see them in action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Technically, I can flip gravity. I don't know. I felt like I should put it on the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, see, you don't really need me after all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's not what I meant. I just wanted to be honest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I haven't seen you do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it hasn't been relevant yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're also really clever. Forget your spells. And funny, and it's good to have you around, so yeah, do you want to go someplace really horrible with your family, or what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Are you all offering?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, Pike. Can he earn his way back in in this manner?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I do think we could use the help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in. Will fancy boy be joining us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you jealous of him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. He's part of the team.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He is part of the team.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, what do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit! This again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tary, it's up to you, but you were talking about going back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I was busy caring for my deceased robot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Doty...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's fine. He'll be fine. I just have to rebuild him. It'll take some time and money, which I don't have.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish I could help, Tary, but I think that's out of my...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have everything we need there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I need him for the brigade!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The brigade, right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. But I can't carry him. Grog, would you be able to...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can carry him!" And you look over and Chod goes over and grabs Doty. (grunt) "Should I "put him somewhere?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet, Chod. Wait until we get somewhere where I can work on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we head back to Whitestone. We gather resources, we figure out how we're getting where we're going to get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could theoretically forge more of these, right? Or do you think they're blessed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find out. We now know they work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wonder if we could take them to Allura or to Shaun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, have Tary Identify them. Maybe it's something specific.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, are they magical, Tary? Are these magical?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside of the field.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Outside of the field.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not extremely strong, but it is very specific, and it is more of an attunement to a specific plane. It has something to do with whoever's bearing it, or whatever's wearing it, is already partially crossed to a certain extent, so it limits the impact of the transition.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I don't understand any of that. But there you have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any more Identify left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we have you Identify the plate armor that the big guy was wearing, so we can see if it's magical?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very well. So this is Plate Armor of Resistance to radiant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's immune to Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's anti-Pike armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that kind of clues us in on a lot, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chod can't use that, can he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you ask this question of him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chod, can you use this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I have it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, do we need it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, let's not...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Radiant means all gods or just good gods?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just good gods I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to put somebody in this armor in Whitestone so that whoever comes through the portal, the first thing they see is something that they feel comfortable and familiar with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those boots are better than my boots. Can I have the boots?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Well, what kind of boots are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's full armor plate. They're still part of the armor set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can get you something else nice. I have a plan for this armor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's-- Oh, Chod! Do you want a jewelry box that makes music?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, you can't give him that jewelry box!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans over to Scanlan. "Hey, boss. Do I want a jewelry box?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Just say yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I would love a jewelry box. Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you? It makes music. You like music.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It makes music, do I want it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When a girl offers you something, you just say yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll mark that off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I pull out the metal skullcap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's loud."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Wait. Is that the Clarota one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's the Lionel Gayheart one. People will have a harder time fucking with you, in general.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is the Clarota one, wasn't it? You're giving the Clarota thing, the resistance-to-mind stuff?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because we could maybe use that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's still an idiot in this group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's maybe a Grog in the group that could totally use it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've had this hat for years.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! So maybe you should remember that you have it and give it to fucking Grog!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've known that I've had it, and I've talked to him about it. No one's ever asked about it, you've never asked about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't know you had it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are a hoarder. You are many good things--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I'm just saying, if Grog has resistance to mind control, then that would be really good for us in a fight with somebody that's really powerfully--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog. This skullcap that Lionel is wearing requires attunement. Would you like to give up one of your really lethal weapons--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Didn't we talk about this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't know it required attunement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sense of dignity, perhaps?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, hey! Is he heavy? Don't you have your own Bag of Holding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not everybody has a Bag of Holding, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just give him everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would turn on you so fast. Let's get back to Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. How do we collapse these tunnels--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we have, thankfully, a professional tunnel collapser.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's true!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Oh, me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So let's find the upstairs entrance and get rid of that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do that from outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was trying to test the radius of this sphere, too. Am I still doing that? Is that still relevant?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's worth noting just in case we cannot find the opening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It comes to about 180 feet from the actual sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow! That's a long way. It's the same as the other one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's similar from when you originally tested it. It was about the width of the whole chamber underneath Whitestone. And that chamber was more cleared out, more of the actual structure was visible. This one is still partially buried and you're only seeing the upper half of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I even have the ability to fly in here? Is there an outer edge where the magic is not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that chamber, you cannot fly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cannot. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I feel like we're going to run into traps if we try to find it from this way. Maybe find it from the outside and just collapse it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That way we don't have to go through a series of shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's double-reinforce, just pile-drive the one that's already a little collapsed and make it really collapsed. And then we'll collapse the others while we're leaving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (happy grunts) Is that permission?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is more than permission. That is permission and an audience. We're very excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's amazing. I'll go for it, and I'll whack on a wall. Do I just hit a wall anywhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in the tunnels, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. You're an engineer, aren't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. No, we're going to be pointing at the things that need to collapse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm ready any time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to go up and see if we can find the thing up top?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Sure! You guys have fun collapsing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's daytime now, right? Outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this time, it would be. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So can me and Keyleth go try to find the entrance up top so we can do something to that one? Matt: Sure, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or should we wait 'til we collapse the tunnels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they can find theirs while we get our tunnels collapsed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure it won't fall on me. No big deal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to help! I'm going to help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just survive a little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keyleth's got our back. She'll burrow in and pull us out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just earring us if something happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Badger. Badgers burrow, right? Do badgers burrow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They do burrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why I said stay, but that's all right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All righty. So you guys all make your way back to the second entrance, the hidden, illusory one. You all back out of it, leaving just Pike and Grog on the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're helping them figure out where to punch to make everything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. So I need you to go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can assist him, which gives him advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah. I will assist you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of 19? Okay. Halfway through the hallway, you find the place where the initial collapse was started. Or you start looking to see what they used to destroy the first entrance that you were supposed to come through. You can see the way it's carved, designed, especially the smooth entrance. Which, now that you get a better look at it, that soft, spongy ground, that dust you were finding: you begin to recognize the pattern of what carved its way in. You saw it used at the top of the Emberhold when you were fighting the queen there. It was a series of Disintegration rays used to carve away into this mountain. That's what that dust is that's on the ground. And why it's such a smooth entrance on this side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I rolled so shitty on that nature check before, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm. However, because it was just a series of magic Disintegrations pushed through to create this second opening, it's a little harder to find points in the structure where the weakness is. So you begin to cut away at some areas, you get like a small axe or one of the various objects that you've-- pointed objects that you've acquired over the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have just a regular pickaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And you just hit at some areas, and you do find one section where you would think it would be a relatively weak point of impact between the various rocks and stones that hold this up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit this and stand on this side of it, and that should do some intense damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would recommend hitting it and then running.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want you to warm up this spot for me, and then you're going to jump on my back and then I'm going to hit it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I jump on your back now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, you hit it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like a backpack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and then you can come up on my back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I hit it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we jump on three, or is it one, two, three, go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike. Go ahead and make a strength check, as Grog throws you up to the ceiling to where the one place in the rock structure is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah boi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ready to run, just in case she just goes beast mode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should make little Pike backpacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, how cute would that be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, guys, that doesn't need to be anywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll just repurpose those Yoda bags.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay, so you take her and you alley-oop and you (impact) hit it and you watch it (cracking) and some dust falls and settles. A couple of small pebbles (falling pebbles). And you grab her like, oh! Okay, seems okay for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Get on, Yoda.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I try to wrap my legs around, but they don't go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rage first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just her but with, like, a jockey on a horse. (straining)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it just happens naturally. So go ahead and roll a strength check with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those gnomish thighs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. So for the height of the cavern here, you get yourself a nice-- you crouch low and full shoryuken-style, like (impact) punch into the roof and as you hit it, impact and go clean through and bring it to the ground. Land, and you hear the (crumbling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys start bolting through, and as you're rushing, Pike, you're looking over and you can see the walls (impacts). You guys are bolting out as well. Both of you guys go ahead and make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot we had to roll for this part.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, don't drop Pikeys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay okay, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you guys are bolting, you're holding onto Grog, and you manage to look behind just fast enough to see one of the walls is about to full-on collapse at the side, and you go ahead and grab the side of Grog's ear and yank his vision that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groan)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just going to start kicking him in the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts turning off to that side, and you manage to just avoid that side of the wall as it (impact).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gif it! Gif it! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you start steering him from behind like a prized racehorse, and making your way through this cavern until eventually the back half of the cavern collapses and comes to a rest. The front half is not collapsing, but you do-- you have a large portion of the path leading to the ziggurat is now just rubble and rocks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay! Good job!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done, well done.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're getting somewhere. But we still need-- there's still more to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's that whole other path. There's that whole-- there's that whole other path and then the one up top.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I could hear a rumble so I know you guys did good on one of those paths already.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks! We did pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now surrounded by a series of browned and leafless trees with these large canopies that have the same pear-like fruit hanging from the branches.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fruit? Fruit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like fruit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you hungry?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm hungry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on. I hold up Pike to go grab some fruit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll check it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry, it's just fruit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can cure us of poison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not if she's busy dying from both ends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (retching) The spins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell, but it looks really tasty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I got great nature skills! Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Looks tasty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As hungry as I am, I think we should wait to have Keyleth look at this fruit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? It's just fruit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because it's outside of this cave, and what if it's a distraction like, "Oh, lookit!" and you eat it and you just die?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, I've found if fruit, when it goes bad, falls from the tree, and it's still on it! Therefore!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And when fruit goes bad, it turns into wine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get crunk drunk!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'm going to wait for Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to have a bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a bite and it's got a fairly moist center. You can see now, like a cactus, the fruits here, most of the moisture is retained within these fruit elements. The flavor, it's not sweet, it's quite pungent, actually. It has a bitterness to it. It's like putting your tongue in a bunch of lye.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it taste good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (disgusted noises)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe make some mayonnaise or something? Want some mayonnaise to cleanse your palate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the jug and I go: honey! Hey!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, all right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a couple of sticky warriors.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just as a breeze blows a bit of a dust cloud through, which coats your sticky hands with heavy desert sand. You chew for a minute and feel the crunch of granules inside your mouth where you inhaled. (crunching)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jug goes away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back to you guys. You were looking for the other entrance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, up top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both of us are looking for it. We're flying up. Can you fly? So, we can fly up. I was going to help you look for it because I figure you have a better ability to collapse it than I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What form are you going to take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A goldfish!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could hold me in your hands. I've got about 30 seconds. Just to fly up? Can I ride side-saddle with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course you can, yes! Put your arms around me, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Your abs are nice, Vex!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I work out a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you been working out over the past year? Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, who's helming the investigation of this? And you're aiding her, so go ahead and take it with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Same thing. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. I left on my collapsing music.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you glance around and do a pass over the next 20 minutes or so. It's as fast as you can, but it takes you a while to scan and get a feel for it. You do see what looks to be, because you felt the wind was coming through from the interior, you see a small well-like crevasse where the rocks have collapsed inward. You can see, glancing over the top, the dark, five, six-foot-wide hole that leads deeper into the mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hover down near it, but don't get off the broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I lean over, I Druidcraft a pebble, toss it in the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't hear it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oracle arrow down the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Your vision watches as it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait! Can she set the end of it on fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arrow gets about maybe 60 feet before it hits a rock and shatters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not straight down. It has a series of platforms, and it looks like it was designed to be climbed down, so it's a bit zig-zaggy. It maybe went 50, 60 feet and it hits a platform and shatters. You lose your vision. But it does appear to be a sizable tunnel used for entry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just fucking collapse it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, just you fucking collapse because I can't do shit to this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I be like, all right! I want to see if I can do this, like, cool maneuver. I'm going to try to balance on the broom, and then jump off the broom and go Keyteor and go into the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into it,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god, Keyleth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just see the side of the mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! Fuck! I get out the rope of entanglement and hover close to the surface and start hanging the rope down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance in the inside with what little bit of daylight is ricocheting off of the stone interior. You can see the edges of Keyleth's elemental form swimming through the rock. Because she can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's fucking crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like Whac-A-Mole!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Careful of traps, though, Keyleth, because I'm sure there's something in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's it going down there? Have you found it yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous. Our friend, Keyleth, is amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She jumped in, didn't she?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to Earth Glide to the bottom and then peek my earthy face out of the top, see if I can see down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you following the actual path?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll try to be conscious to make sure I don't hit anything that looks precarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't hit any traps!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right! Looking for traps! That's okay, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Okay. You get about a third of the way down, and you realize that one of the platforms that you can land on has, uncharacteristically, a softer cushion to it. Everything else is just stone slabs. This one has almost--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Waterbed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! (laughs) Like a spring air mattress, it's crazy. No, it's like a woven, dried palm frond-like cloth that's rested over it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure it's nothing. Probably nothing. Just leave it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a drop-through? Can I, like-- fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fuck with anything, Keyleth. Just collapse it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I found, like a, it might be a roof or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I bet Clarota's in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Piranhas? I don't know if piranhas are in rocks, but there might be something else in there. There might be piranhas. Oh, I'll avoid it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You continue southward, scooting. You can sense the very exterior of the wall that leads to this path, so you're staying away from it as you glide through the rock and earth. Eventually, you come close to the very top, breaching the dome that leads down into the chamber where you had your battle naught but an hour ago. As you poke your face through, you're looking down, you can see the dark sphere there, hovering. You can see the large pyramid structure below it, probably about 60 feet below you. You can see the entrance to the tunnel that leads into here. There is a small ladder up along the wall that previously you didn't notice because of the lack of light and attention to the ceiling portion. But people were either climbing up into or climbing down from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you see, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, these are very innovative cultists.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you're looking down at the ziggurat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Hey, Pike and Grog, you guys did an excellent job.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh thanks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It really means a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get the fuck away from it, Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Good idea!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, it's fantastic. You all hear through it (earth elemental grumbling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The grumbling, low voice of an earth elemental speaking to you through the earring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you turn into Keyleth again, you're fucked!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (unintelligible grumbling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get the fuck out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try and say, like, well, I know it's about 180 feet because I tested before, so I'm trying to be conscious of it. And then I back up a little bit, and I go over to where that tunnel was, and I start collapsing it down. As I work my way up, I'm going (impacts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easily enough. You go by and you start kicking through the tunnel as you go. You can sense near proximity where any of the various weak points are in the stone. Systematically go through it, collapse it, piece by piece, until eventually most of the tunnel is useless and unusable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a platformer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long can you maintain your wild shape?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half of my level, or something like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're fine, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or it's a third of my level? Still several hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You emerge a little over an hour or so of doing this. You emerge from the top. You watch as Keyleth (rock impacts), looking like a large version of Fantastic Four's Thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm holding my rope for her. You don't-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be taken care of. All of the entrances have been collapsed. There's no way that you can imagine any average person can find their way into this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job. Are you going to stay that way, or are you turning back into you so that I can get you on the broom?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (guttural noise of agreement) (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can still talk, right? You just sound low.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (guttural gibberish) I speak a different language that I still don't think anyone has--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can-- you maintain your mental acuity and statistics when you're in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. We've gone back and forth on it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It never occurred to you to speak Common. Why would I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The texture and timbre of your voice. You can hear words, but it's almost like words being made by slamming rocks together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that different from my normal speech.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I won't bore you with the details, but while all that was going on, while they were searching and they were destroying things, Vax wandered a hundred feet out and sat down and did a little talking to the mother of ravens, and basically said, not expecting an answer: This is it, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom check.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not good. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps we'll meet soon enough."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will see you soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys reconvene.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, guys. How's it going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, guys!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should try the local fruit. It's delicious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, you guys should try it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pick up a piece of the local fruit and smell it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll go with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't think I will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It belies its true flavor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has it gone bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. There are elements that have gone bad on the ground and have been covered by sand as winds blow through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Naturally awful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In fact, it's traded specifically for its use in various herb pouches.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it have a name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like that giant, stinking flower. Grog took a bite of the giant, stinking flower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A vafall fruit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did it alter Grog's stats on any level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then it's not that healthy, is it? It's like agave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vafall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Listen to Sam. He's got the pronunciation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will eat you with a lovely chianti and some vafall.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Vafall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we take some, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make some medicine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could try to bake with it. Maybe it's bakeable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It makes a really good salve. It's good for sunburns.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or shoving in somebody's bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we get back to Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a tree that this fruit was coming off of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I point at the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ones on the outskirts of the mountain range are small, but the deeper into the valleys and ravines between the large spire-like mountains, you do find a few that are probably large enough to utilize through your spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, are you coming back to Whitestone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to, yes. I have to repair Doty, and also find some new recruits. I think there are some in Whitestone, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're really going through with this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course. It's my destiny. I met you all to become an adventurer, and now I'm bringing my knowledge back to my people. It's like it was written in a book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A very good book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're writing a book!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And not only that, you're going to be the leader of a band of adventurers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you a colonel, a general, a private?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hadn't thought of that. You know what? There's no leader of Vox Machina, so maybe there won't be in the Darrington Brigade. Well, besides you. You're unofficially-- you're definitely the treasurer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm behind her doing this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, rolling eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lionel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it good? How are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's getting really heavy. This is really heavy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Are you coming back to Whitestone, as well? Scanlan, I mean Aes-- is he coming back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I suppose we'll need him for now, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm never going to get bored of this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, what do you think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a fucking awesome physical reaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At least in the short term.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't see any similarities." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's everything I wanted. I'm good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Through the tree, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you finish concentrating on the outside of one of these large, 15 to 20-foot-tall, leafless, fruit-bearing trees in the center of the Smoldercrown Forest, the doorway shifts open, revealing on the opposite side the dark, sunless night of Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pick a blossom from the tree on the way out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull two of the fruits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the windows of nearby homes, shops, and various structures near the square are beginning to glow from the interior light of small lanterns and candles. In the distance, you can see the perimeter beacons being put along the castle walls on the exterior of Castle Whitestone. You're back home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's gather our troops.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make thy way to the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Find out what they've learned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At which point, Lionel keeps asking, "Can I put him down yet? Can I put him down?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not quite yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to take him to the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Change arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty's delivered to the workshop. Taryon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stays there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll keep you informed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys now have the run of the castle. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We asked Cassandra to gather people to study the Shadowfell as soon as we did the oracle arrow last time, so it would probably be smart to find out what they've learned before we make our plans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you approach Cassandra, at this hour, she currently has a recently steeped, still-steaming cup of tea resting on the table, towards the window side, the front window side, of the general dining hall area of the castle where you usually eat your supper. She's facing away from the table and has a thick robe over her and has the tea and is in the process of reading through books. Her hair's pulled up tightly, and some of it's a mess in front of her face. She's very much in work mode. She's poring through books, and as soon as you enter, she reaches over for her cup of tea. "Oh. Hello, everyone." She gets herself a little more presentable. "I've got "the assistance of Eskil Ryndarien. Everyone else seems to be a bit busy at the moment, but Allura "is doing the best she can research on her end, as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to need everybody. It's worse than we could have imagined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we have far less time than we would have imagined.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much time do we have?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This has to be taken care of immediately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Things are happening now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you have far better means of acquiring these people than I do. I can merely "send missives and requests."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to send word out. I'm going to take out my flask and put it on the table. Sit down for a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it and adds it to her tea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Ryndarien here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is. He's currently inspecting the ziggurat again. He's setting his notes up where he "previously set up research quarters during the incursion of the Conclave."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get everyone away from it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's in Emon. She's still part of the council there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to get her here immediately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Gilmore still in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, he's back in Emon."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He left for good?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run down to the ziggurat and try to get Eskil Ryndarien away from it and warn everyone to stay away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's double-check that armor for any weird influences it may have, to make sure it is what it seems to be, which is ornamental, with a bit of magic. Let's make sure that the captain of whatever guard is on shift down by the ziggurat is wearing it, and is aware that he's there to befuddle the enemy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the lights have been snuffed except for a few torches that are set around the central platform that was built about mid-height on the ziggurat, where you guys had the council meeting with Raishan that one time, and where most of the research is being done there. Up top, you see a number of guards, the Pale Guard are assigned to keep watch. You see Jecht, the manservant of the Realmseer Eskil there, as well. Currently, you see Eskil Ryndarien is spreading out his thick scrolls and books, and they're all across the big central wooden table, and he has his thick spectacles on, and he has a number of candles already set up, and he's deep into getting his space prepped and acquiring whatever information he'd put away since the investigation was put on hold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eskil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard you've come up in the world."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes. I'm a lady now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous. Yes. What do I have the honor?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but I'm afraid being down here isn't safe anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that's par for the course. It's basically most of my life."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plenty of work up top, away from this orb of death. It's very dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! You're right. I didn't know that. I've only spent six months with the thing!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've discovered it's a gateway, and things can come through it, and there might be armies coming through because we just fought somebody on the other side of another ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's preposterous. Siphons only work one way, my dear. Nothing's coming through there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She changed it. Did you know that siphons can be changed? It changed from one color to another.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know this how?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I was there to witness it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In Ank'harel. And it looks the exact same as this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks you over really intensely. "If what you believe you saw is indeed another one of these "siphons, then perhaps we should take a little more care."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're taking this outside."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous. You're so agreeable. I do love talking to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful. Good to know. Goodbye." They gather up the materials. The Pale Guard escorts them back into the hallway, and he's now talking to Jecht off on the side. He goes, "Well, then we "can go ahead and stage ourselves in the grand guestroom with the nice big bed. Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The big ornate bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's wondrous."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have wonderful hearing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I can tell. Yes, the big bed. The one that helps with my back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, that's terrible. Can you look at this armor really fast and make sure that it's not actually cursed or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Looks fine to me!" Keeps walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it cursed, or anything, when you looked at it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did not appear to be cursed from your glance at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would he have known from the Identify spell if it was cursed? Great. Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Keyleth go talk to Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in Cassandra's room, still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth waits for Percy. Hang on. I can go talk with Cassandra, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you're having a closed conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just ten seconds of it. We'll see how this goes. Have a bit of that flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's already poured some into her tea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've found a second ziggurat. We found a cult that is moving things through it. The cult was being led by Delilah Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The silence, the stark absence of sound, is completely sundered by the sound of shattering porcelainware. The tea that she had recently barely sipped on is now shattered and spilled across the ground. She stands there, her hand open as it slowly curls back. She stares off into the distance, clenching her fist very tightly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She escaped into the ziggurat, so she's no longer on this plane of existence, but some form of her, whether it's undead or otherwise, we're going to need to put it down again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, we do."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanted you to hear it from me. There will be no running this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No running."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you'll take care of her?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the end of her. I will be there to see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have to end it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will discover what she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't destroy her body. Destroy everything she is."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we can't kill her, we will entrap her forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shatter the soul. Whatever it takes. End her, brother."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I shall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the flask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanted you to hear it from me so you could compose yourself when other people begin to tell you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need a moment alone, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to need us to be the strongest. I have faith in you. I'll leave you to it. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to be sick."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I'm going to leave her to her room and shut the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You close the door and there in the hallway, waiting opposite the door, is Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did that go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, better than I expected.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you hear behind the door, a muffled (retching).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More sick and less things breaking. I'd rather her be sick than angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think? I hate being sick. Anger at least drives you towards something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does not drive de Rolos towards anything good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fair point. I have a crazy thought, and I needed to run by you. Sorry, didn't mean to hit you. Okay. I'm excited. All right. We watched the orb change. She changed the magic in the orb, right? We just spent a year making magical orbs that change in some way, that are all linked to our city. Clearly, not as powerful as what this is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if-- I don't know. What if she corrupted something that was already there that wasn't supposed to be corrupted? What if she can corrupt more things, like our crisis orbs? I had this immediate fear that what if I built something that was supposed to help--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so glad you thought of me when this came up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you helped me build it. Am I crazy for thinking it? Am I totally off base?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to be walking a very fine line of paranoia for the next however long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe there's something in our own technology, in our own magic, that can help inform us. I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When they get here, we're going to look at everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. We'll sleep on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to be fine, but you did give me some ideas that I'm going to think about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And those symbols. The necklaces. Druids, we use similar things when we plane shift to other worlds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take one to the library and inspect it. I'm going to also see what any of our other arcanists think of it. If it's from a cult that anybody has heard of before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I can plane shift us there with it if we don't want to go through the orb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think. It seems like very similar technology. Magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rubbing off on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know. Sleep on it. I'm going to go think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to double-check the orb room just for a moment, for my own paranoia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The crisis orb room? Actually, I'll go with him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to look, and then I'm going to start researching that symbol. I'm going to go to the library and I'm showing the council everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good! Take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you recall... all the books that would cover that time period, you remember hearing stories from Allura regarding the Whispered One, originally. There's no mention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it a physical omission from the books, or is it even that the books that would cover it are not here? Books that should cover it that don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Historical recalling of Wildmount, which if you recall, based on some of Allura's discussion on the Whispered One's previous existence as a mortal, largely, Vecna's work was done over on the Wildmount side of Exandria.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there's no--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bitch! Sorry. Go on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what's happening over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't, either.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing that's simple. Like, the more I'm looking, I'm looking for mention of the symbols--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth, you know damn well where I am right now, I'm sitting in the library reading books, so if you have something to say. Oh, wow, you're going way back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm looking. I'll meet you in the library.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that Hercules Mulligan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a tiny Hercules Mulligan. I was looking for him! He's been in here the whole time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delilah gets knocked out, she gets the fuck back up again!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four set of corsets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a barbarian, I think it is. We have to work out the 5e classes for the Hamilton characters. Get on it, Critters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in the library reading if anybody needs me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else wishing to accomplish anything else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the kitchen. I want to see if they can make a salad with meat in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they figure out how, bring some up to the library.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm not very up to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Deposit it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within an hour or so, you are presented with a bowl of various textures of shredded, cured, and prepared meats to loosely resemble a salad, I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A malad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a giant poke bowl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a salad with meat on it, it's a salad made of meat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thin slices.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is far greater than anything I could have hoped for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Previously, on Hannibal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you invent this just now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at the wait staff and they, "Actually, sir, it was Chef Varon." You look over and you see this one, and you've seen a couple of the chefs here, you haven't interfaced with them too much. You're not a social figure necessarily, more of a demanding figure when it comes to the food and the meal. But you see this gentleman with this thin John Waters pencil mustache, this thinning hair that's short, but slick, with a bit of pattern baldness going on. He's a bit thick around the waist and he's sitting there with a big, beaming grin of pride.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to name it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, Grand Poobah, I image that would be your honor to give. I am but humbled to present "you with such a meal, so the choice is yours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What fine tender meats are in this dish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, we've got quite a variety. I wanted to provide an extravagant walk through the "various creatures that we prepare here in Whitestone. Would you like me to continue?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please, yes! I'm talking to myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have two-week salted goat meat. On top of that we have hickory-kept long angle-smoked "fish guts mixed in there with a wondrous mix of minced steaks, we've spared no possible expense on "the various pieces of the cow. We've, from that point forward, presented a sprinkling of pork "belly that's been ground up and salt-cured as well over the period of about two months usually kept "to our various steam meals, but I thought this was a special occasion."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just free-dripping saliva in and on the plate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, it has a very sedimentary layers of the planet-type feel to it where each reveal occurs "it's a whole different genus of animal. You're eating nature in a bowl!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, did you even, like, salt it or nothing? It's just all these beautiful animals in my own private ark of a bowl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, because it's got goat, fish, beef, and pork in it I'm going to call it the GoFiBePo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "GoFiBePo it is."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bowl of GoFiBePo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "GoFiBePo."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, Grand Poobah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I must decree there will be no utensils used when you dine of this sublime dish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He begins writing these things down. "All right, all right. You would need approval from "Lady Cassandra, of course, to put this in the familial--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Approval?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you were to make this the official meal of Whitestone, that is entirely within--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You heard him, folks! Grand Poobah has spoken."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: GoFiBePo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: GoFiBePo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even better. And I'll just start hand-smashing into my face this delicious salted meat collection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm hungry now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, it is delightful. It is delicious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was absurd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to eat it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meat salad. You're welcome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It actually sounds really good. Cured goat meat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's currently being submitted to the senate of Whitestone for approval to become the official dish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! After every battle, we'll get all the protein we need and we'll just fart our happy asses off, all night long.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all shabu-shabu from here on out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. With a constitution check it might improve your speed. All right. So. What else do you wish to do, as it is now getting close to the midnight hour here at Whitestone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've been an extra set of eyes in the library.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and I call Vex there as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be there in just a moment, dear. I just want to find Vax. Can I find Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go look-- I'll look in his room and then I'll look in the temple to the Raven Queen that we have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in my room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiki, is that-- Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well. No. Hi. That's gross.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it, though? Is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it? Hey. One quick thing that I was thinking about, and I know that you keep bringing it up and I keep dodging this, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But-- So, when I was researching the Raven Queen--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- she hates undead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's kind of her thing, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the fact that Delilah Briarwood is back again and the person that we're going after, it seems perfect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Almost like fate, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think your queen lady is going to chime in there and help us out? Maybe end this cycle of whatever the fuck it is she's doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She will be there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the Shadowfell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She will be with us when we reach the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cryptic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it is religion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, like Pike has always said, I don't have all the answers at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I mean, do you talk to her, though? Because, you know, Pike talks to Sarenrae.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right! So have you asked her if she's going to help us kill Delilah Briarwood?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's more of a vibe kind of thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
