lines.text: But the vibe I get, I'm not going to call it good. This is it. This is what you and I have been doing our homework for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's not going to slow down, it's only going to speed up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think I'm going back to Zephra anytime soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Otherwise you're doomed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the best year of my life. I'm very happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Life is good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Life is good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to ensure that it stays that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry I didn't have more for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no! It's about what I expected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm. If you see my druid, would you send her to bed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I go to the library.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Percival, Keyleth. Pike, I believe you're helping out in the library as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're literally reading through old notes right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A fuckton of old notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Vex arrives to meet up with you guys in the library of Whitestone. Whatever you're doing, Scanlan, I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh my gosh. Oh. Okay. Oh, praise Sarenrae, there's so much going on. Okay. Remember how Whitestone used to be all dead and awful? Very similar to how the other Ziggurat was dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then they called the ziggurat the seat of Pelor, right? So what if it was already there? What if she's taking doorways and dimensions and corrupting them and bastardizing them and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she's done that, if she did that to the Sun Tree, how old is Delilah Briarwood?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Sun Tree has been around since before--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Sun Tree was here before the castle was here, but-- And things have always happened here. The city has a history of strange occurrences. I'm inclined to believe there was something-- Well, there was obviously something beneath the castle before she got here, or else she wouldn't have come here to begin with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a temple to Ioun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the temple still lost beneath this valley, that was when the Sun Tree seed was planted by Pelor to be guardian over this space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was he locking away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A god called the Chained Oblivion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Chain Oblivion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Chained Oblivion. Tharizdun. Yeah. A mad god of chaos and destruction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Totally awesome metal band.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, great name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, well, that's a big deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, I mean, I think it's safe to assume that that's what's down there and that's what they were looking for when they came here in the first place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Delilah came from Wildmount?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. She was also, I mean--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did a bunch of research on Vecna. He used to be a man, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wanted to become the Prince of the Undead, right? Am I saying that right? No no no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you've come to understand and the research you've done since the name has come up--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pulling out my notes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We spent a year reading books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Now mind you, the information is still very hard to find.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's the god of secrets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which has only been achieved by one being before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it sounds a lot like what Delilah is going for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if she

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if she

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, or she wants to become the next Vecna.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She came here for research.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's just finishing what he started.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe she's just finishing what he started. And wasn't she doing a bunch of research for runes and tomes? Do we have the research that the Briarwoods-- Didn't we seize a bunch of their research?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got some of it, but they burned a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got some of it and a lot of it dealt with ley energies. There are certain lines that stretch across, invisible lines that stretch across Exandria, where the magical powers that hold together the planes and protect it through the Divine Gate and other elements--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do any of those ley lines go through where we were in Marquet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know that. But you do know that Whitestone resides right beneath a nexus. These ley lines were shifted during the Calamity. And now one of these nexuses is right over Whitestone, which is why this location was chosen for the ritual that the Briarwoods were assembling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if each ziggurat is over a nexus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could be. We know that she's not ancient, because we have a bit of a paper trail. We do know that she was ruling in Wildmount for a while. We do know that she studied at the Alabaster Lyceum briefly. And there's some paperwork for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In looking up the background history, you would know that King Bertrand Dwendal of the Dwendalian Empire was given information in regards to the Briarwoods, who were essentially accused of forbidden necromancy. And were to be arrested and put on trial, and that's when they fled westward towards Tal'Dorei and then encountered your family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they got run out of Wildmount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From what we understand and again, there's not much that survived that. They tend to cover their tracks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were also trying to build that whole bridge situation? Remember the bridge? That was weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They wanted to move. Well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They wanted to move an army. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing in their notes spoke of actually making a bridge. It was more a means to get into the graces of the royal family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And probably collect assets as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. If you were run out of somewhere--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which I have been.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which you have been. After a lot of research--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which I've done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- and you were trying to do something--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- what would be your second place of choosing to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, if you're run out of one place for doing something, I imagine--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're thinking maybe they have another portal in Wildmount.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another ziggurat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could be several of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they are run out of one place for something, my first thing would be try to find the next place to keep it going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. And then she got run out of here, so she went to Ank'harel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many theories! It's kind of exciting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not get overly speculative here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are ziggurats always pyramids?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what a ziggurat is. It's like an Aztec bip-bip-bip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know the Briarwoods also did dealings with the Stormwinds in Wildmount.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What other pyramids have we seen, though? Have we seen any other--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The thing we fought the beholder in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The mindflayer place. That was a ziggurat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Under Kraghammer! Oh my god! Is there a ziggurat in Kraghammer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hell yeah there is a ziggurat. Yeah, it was a ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen a few, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm speaking in my voice because I'm not there, but he said-- Yeah, oh, he's poker-facing it. We said ziggurat many times when we were down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we see a pyramid when we were in Wildmount? When we went there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were barely there, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it would've been underground. I mean, who knows where the fuck it was? Wait, wait, wait! What about the temple where we saw the other sphinx? Was that another ziggurat there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that was up in Vasselheim! Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Is there a ziggurat--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a ziggurat on every continent! (singing) Every continent has a ziggurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can come out everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So collapsing the tunnels didn't really do that much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, because it shut one potential vein of a dozen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's these damn ley lines. I knew there's been something up with these ley lines and I tried to talk to the Sun Tree about it and he didn't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's a tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be nice to the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he's very cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So all the bodies that were hanging under Whitestone, right, they were all stapled to the walls? Was that the army? Was she trying to fill them with necromantic energy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, they would've come alive if there had been a giant blast of necrotic energy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. The bodies weren't feeding the thing. She was trying to imbue them with--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was preparing to create an army.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. And they were missing arms?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't look in the ziggurat in Ank'harel. There could've been bodies there, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think they had gotten that far yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And one of the things I have written down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why were they throwing magical things into it, though? It was magical items into--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Offerings? Because they would've become magical once they got to the other side of the portal. I mean, they would've been great gifts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think, Taryon Darrington? Or Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary is fixing Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've never given up on anything in your life. Now live! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ed Harris in The Abyss. You've never given up a day in your life, you bitch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in my room, praying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In your room, praying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Praying to Sarenrae?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Logic is a fickle god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lady Briarwood is immune to daylight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like watching your game in fast-forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Briarwoods have an army. I have it in giant, big letters, but I don't know what that means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously, it would take a very long time to go to every ziggurat that we've seen and see if there's an army inside of it. If they've been preparing things there over this past year that we haven't been doing anything!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should just go through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go to the Shadowfell and fucking end this before she sets out her armies everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did let her regroup a little bit, but we didn't know what we were doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was nothing we could have done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to mess with the stones? Try and duplicate them? We have seven, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have seven. We could go through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven of us could go through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) We're only seven people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's only seven of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's eight. One of us would have to stay behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's the eighth? Count the table, friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary's staying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tary's the eighth. Are we going to go through with Tary? I'm being such an asshole right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could also maybe Plane Shift us there with one of these?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we take damage going through the portal with the stone, does that mean we might take damage if you Plane Shift us there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who knows? It's the Shadowfell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we speak with Allura, and if this looks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to talk to Eskil Ryndarien and see what he knows about the Shadowfell, right? He's been studying the Shadowfell, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since he arrived, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the plan is we take the fight to them.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it worth going back to any of the other ziggurats, or no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so, at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we take care of them, it doesn't matter how many ziggurats there are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just have to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hope we don't miss one. Travel the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, at least Vecna's not a god. Bonus there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have an evening, and then tomorrow, we'll--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tally-ho?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Collect what we've learned, and if we're prepared, jump into a sphere of death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't waste time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we jump through the sphere of death, they might be expecting us on the other side of the sphere of death. If we Plane Shift, we might be able to come up with a flanky, secret, other tactic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you can figure out a way to use one of these to create a Plane Shift that you'll feel comfortable with, then I'm all right with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll talk it over with other magic-users, first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which ones?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. I'll find one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can go visit one of them. I'm not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make the call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eskil knows stuff like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's all get some sleep, and in the morning, we're going to take care of this. One way or the other, we'll take this fight to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll talk to Eskil, because I hate that motherfucker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He likes you. Well, he doesn't dislike you any more than he dislikes anybody else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He dislikes you even less. He just hates everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's terrible, isn't he?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Crotchety old fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're all going to go in for the evening, and we'll come back to this in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. One second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you guys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my gosh. We figured out so much stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me the download.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Delilah might be Vecna, and all this, there are ziggurats everywhere, and we're so dumb because we've probably seen several ziggurats, and they're all on these massive ley lines, and I give him a whole dialogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy moly. Do you need to get word back home? Because I don't think we're going home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, the dreams I've been having all year and telling you about. They felt like this. This is the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think if we go in, we're never coming back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not saying that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think if we go in,

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I didn't say that, either. We were going to go back in a day or two, and I don't think that's happening. Do you think everyone at home, they're good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll have someone send a message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't resign to this. You can't give up on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiki, I'm not giving up. I will never give up on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see it in your eyes. You think this is it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your dad's probably worrying. I worry about him worrying about you, that's all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Everything going on right now, and you're worried about my dad? Typical boyfriend, I guess. That's fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I am so anxious right now, and the only thing that is going to distract me is all your fucking freckles, so come to bed, all right? Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Promise me you'll come back with me, no matter what.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I promise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if it doesn't happen, just promise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's an easy promise to make. I promise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just need you to believe it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I believe. Get the fuck in this bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you all find your evening's rest, preparing for the next morning in whatever means you wish to prepare for. We're going to take a break. We'll be back here in a few minutes to pick up this next length of the journey and see where it takes us. We're giving away on the break a Purpleheart dice box from Wyrmwood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the most beautiful one.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: The Scanlan wood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get that Scanlan wood!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, the Gabon ebony is really nice, but the Purpleheart--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you say gay-bone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the Gabon. Gabon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, so for that contest you need to come over to Twitch chat, and I've actually forgotten what word we chose for today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scorsese.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome back to Critical Role. Oh god, they're closer now. I'm starting to rethink this scenario.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Life comes at you fast, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That it does, apparently. Anyway, welcome back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a really good one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys rested for the evening and found yourself the following morning, presenting the possibility of making your way into the Shadowfell and what waits for you there. You come to consciousness, you have your morning meal, you begin to plot and plan. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go find Eskil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go find Eskil. Somebody else is going to go find out from him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's actually eating out in the garden. He has one of the little tables set out there. It's a nice morning out in Whitestone right now. It's chilly, but the clouds have broken a bit. You can see some blue skies; a little bit of sun's breaking through. He's out there with Jecht, his associate, who's in the process of cutting his food for him while Eskil's sitting there, still looking through books and occasionally reaching over and plucking things from his plate to eat. As you approach him, he doesn't even look up. He goes, "Yes? What do you require?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good morning to you, as well, I suppose."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lovely weather today, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is weather, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So! How's the research on the Shadowfell going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's done. I've researched it. I don't know what you require."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of it. All of the research?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As much as is in the tomes I have at my disposal, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything we should know? Anything important? Fill us in a little bit? Spark Notes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a plane of negative energy, and elements of it are used to funnel the transition "of souls from life to death or back. A number of it is scourged by undeath and those that skirt "that process. It exists as a mirror plane, much like the Feywild. There are elements that resemble "Exandria, but twisted, shifted. It is a very barren, very broken, dust-filled, dark-- not a "very pleasant place, really."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And chock-full of undead, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Elements of it, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Used to transport souls? Give me a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, she carries this book around. She's very precise with her notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. You should be. Precision is recommended."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to show him the necklace that we found. This seems to have a slight magical attunement to the Shadowfell. Do you think I could use this as a plane-shifting device?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would need some alteration. It's possible. Very careful alteration. You need it to "be a very narrow fork in order to properly channel the spell, and this does not quite match the "proper division of magical energies. It could be physically altered to do so, but too much and you "ruin the minor enchantment and attunement."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. That's very good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But doable?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With how much time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I'm no metalworker. I imagine not too much."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Are you able to send messages? You have Sending, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans back, looking slightly offended. "I have means to communicate with individuals of "importance, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just wondering if you could tell my dad that I might be gone for a long time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have absolutely no interest in any of what you just said."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd really owe you one, Eskil. Just a quick message?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not a messenger service for individuals' parental units."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we are potentially going to throw ourselves at the greatest evil that this world has ever known, in the hopes that the entire world can survive, so that's a big favor. That's a big gimme for you. So maybe in exchange for that, you could send a little message.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just to my dad to let him know that I might die attempting to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who's your father?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Korren of the Ashari, who is one of the headmasters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, of the wind people. Whatever. Right, okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who is your daddy, and what does he do? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He thinks for a second. Begins to run his finger in the air, and you watch as there's a faint scrolling of soft bluish-white light. (poof) Turns to smoke and vanishes. "All right, he knows "you're going to be off doing stuff in the Shadowfell and probably won't be back for a while."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we maybe borrow your research notes on the Shadowfell? Is that a thing? No? (sighs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thud)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seriously, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome. I will call into this favor later."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. You know where to find us. What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Enjoy your tea and biscuits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Eskil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they sweet or savory?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're delicious."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (frustrated noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While that was going on, is that caravan still in town that was coming through? We've only been gone a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still in town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any fancy fucking chalices that I could fucking buy for a Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whitestone is made of fancy chalices, isn't it, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a chalice room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, if you're spending a good portion of the morning going around, asking. Being your charismatic self and well-versed in gathering information in a marketplace, you do find two chalices for sale that would match the specifications required to cast a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey. Do you want to buy a chalice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's crazy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sipping cups. What do you need?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of them is super gauche.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one has an anti-dribble chinnage. For all those nights you're drinking too hard and you "don't want to spill all over your front pouch?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a sippy cup lid, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That will cost you extra."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Five gold, for the sippy cup."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this fancy enough for a Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much for the cup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Each cup, because these traveled quite a bit. They'll bring you about 1,200 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 1,200 gold pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apiece, or total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apiece."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is the school crossing guard from my hometown in New Jersey in Whitestone right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, you think I haven't been busy after you left school?" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody in Weehawken is like, what happened to Larry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Found a new occupation: chalice collector."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What am I going to do with all these chalices?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Actually..."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Larry. You know that these chalices are probably going to be used to save the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds like a perfect reason to buy them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It does, doesn't it? And just think how wonderful it will be when you can tell everyone that you sell to that you sold the things that saved the world to Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't a one. Persuasion, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vox Machina, you say? You know these folks?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Vex'ahlia, at your service.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eye widens on one side. "Well, I've not really seen or know much about you folks, but I've "heard tales of you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn and show him the scales from the Chroma Conclave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That real dragon? No shit. Well, I mean, tell you what." He pulls out a piece of paper and starts scrawling on it. He pulls out his inkwell and starts dipping it. "If you would do the honor "of signing this official document that says that these were sold to none other than Lady Vex'ahlia "of Vox Machina that I can use as proof of this transaction for my own promotional purposes, I'll "be happy to give you both of these--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is my favorite shop on the Citadel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the equivalent of the head shot on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, basically. "I will happily give you both of these at a discount of 1,000 gold pieces apiece."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like your style. Can I insight and make sure this isn't some sort of enchanted piece of fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would I add to that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your insight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, see if he's full of shit. 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? Fuck it. We're probably going to die, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A pleasure doing business with you, milady." Hands you the two chalices. They're beautiful. One's more reddish gem-encrusted. The other has a platinum spiral that runs around the base of it. They're both beautiful and intricate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you just threw the sippy cup lid as a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the chalice on the go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now stay in school, Liam. Stay in school.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've acquired your chalices. What other business do you guys want to take care of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make sure I have enough powder and shot for a bit of a jaunt, so I'm going into the stores of what we make here and reloading. I'm also going to try and make some silver shot. I've never tried it before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a ton. I want to try and make 12. I want to see if I can make 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be intelligence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a new concept you're trying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your proficiency.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus my proficiency. That's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: but it is susceptible to enchantment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why I was going to then take those to Pike. I don't entirely understand how this works, but I had an idea. And I show her the 12 silver bearings, basically. Would you know how to bless something like this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this might come in handy. It's a wild idea. I don't know. I'm trying to think of surprising her with something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that's actually a fantastic idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're a bit hard to make, and they may just not be useful at all, but I thought... I don't know how any of this works.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll see what I can do. Yeah. I'll see what I can do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take the silver shot. Anyone want to try anything else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) Where do I get holy oil?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the church.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've gotten holy oil before. I just can't remember from where.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. "You look like you're looking for something to buy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? Larry, do you have any holy oil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My lady. Do I? I happen to have one vial of holy oil, good for two applications."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. That's it? Just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Traveled a long way, and you're a little late in the shopping day. I was all full on them, "but they've been flying off the shelf. My apologies."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Skeletons everywhere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vex, I have some holy oil?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. I just have a vial of it. I don't know how much that is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good for two applications, I think.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably good for two applications.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three applications with the vial that you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this one has a little bit missing? How much? Because this is less than it normally is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, you've already done some good business with me. I'll give it to you for 150."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would eat there all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 150 gold. Sure. Only because Percy gave me a look. You know what-- yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's going to keep trying to listen to one word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot to unpack here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not hearing music. We'll check that in a second. Anybody else want to prepare anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I want to track down Kynan for a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've finished their early round of training for the morning, and some of the early Pale Guard recruits are in the process of rushing off and taking a small lunch break. He's currently taking a lot of the equipment from the training grounds and setting it aside in the various weapon racks, and generally cleaning up the space as you approach. He looks over his shoulder as he sets some of the practice blades along the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, brother man. How's all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. All's well. Just keeping things going. Got a lot of good up-and-coming folks."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got all these ladies and gentlemen in shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Working on it. It's a process."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyway, I'm glad that I have Simon back, but I feel bad because I gave it to you and I took it away. But we're leaving, and I want to travel light, so I wanted to make it up to you. I have this. I'm going to give you this dagger. It's the Keen Dagger. Take this. It's too much; I can't use it. I've got this thing. Anyway. Just hold onto it. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you very much. I'll keep it at my side." He takes the basic dagger out of his sheath and chucks it into the corner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That one's better. And thanks, and I think Percy's thankful, too. I think. You're doing really good work here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Thank you very much."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look where you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's still a ways to go."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pat, pat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pat, pat where?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The open palm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On his cheek. That's it. Anyway, you're busy. We'll see you soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to it. Stay safe."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will. Keep up the good work. (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess Taryon will go find Vex. Stumble up and say, I have to stay here and keep working on Doty. I understand you're leaving today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to come with us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cannot. I have to stay and fix Doty and get back to my home. I'm sorry. It's been a pleasure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say it's been a pleasure!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been an honor to have your acquaintance, and I'm afraid I have to return, but perhaps we'll meet again sometime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him a big old hug. And I give him...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three copper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him-- I don't have any feathers left, I don't think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any money? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no money, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically speaking, you've been on salary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, I ripped it up about two weeks after you moved in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. And you have no other money on you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open up my pouch, and I've got zero personal gold. Just party funds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I feel like I should leave you with all of my belongings, and all of my magical items, but I need them for my brigade. I'll leave you with the seashell crown that who gave me? Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy gave me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he'd want you to have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want the half of a geode rock with 30 living souls inside of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, give it to me. Thanks, friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't use it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30-soul rock. Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 Rock Soul? (giggles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30 souls just sitting in a rock. You think my shit's weird?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe I should have shown that to Pike sometime in the last year?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will show it to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just been sitting on your bedside, hasn't it? Slowly making the sound of crying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you get really close at night, you hear this faint (screams).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts another pillow over it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think you'll see Percy anytime soon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I might.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you do, (pink) can you give him this little gem for his flashlight? I can't spare many, but that will give him one flashlight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He'll have to come back, anyway, because he doesn't know how to make the ammo for his gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you going to get Doty home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, after he's fixed, me and Chod--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Lionel. I think he likes to be called Lionel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I prefer Chod. I think we'll set off the old-fashioned way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See who you pick up along the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! That could be chapter one of the new book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. A New Hope. Something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it. It's epic. Catchy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Well, I'm not going to say have fun, because you're going to a terrible place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He says it every time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never said that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you die, I will be very upset. Hey, if I die, your thing will glow, so that will be good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Same. So we'll know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll see you sometime in Wildemount?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course we'll come visit you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, too. Take care of your hair. You know, you shouldn't wash it as often as you do. It just makes it dry and flaky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The oil is helpful. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get it trimmed every two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And have someone comb it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I probably should do that, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really disgusting sometimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll brush it a hundred brush strokes every night, just like you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. All right. Goodbye. I'll see you soon, Little Elf Girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bye, Goldie. (fake-cries)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what do you wish to do, guys?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there a way that I can bless these bullets?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not bullets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will take you a while to do so. You could temporarily bless them with the Bless spell, but to infuse them with the blessing would be the equivalent of a small enchantment, so it would take you a couple of days or something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I could start it, depending on when we leave, I guess. I have Bless. I was looking at that, but I didn't know I could use that on actual objects, other than people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also have to modify one of the necklaces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That needs to go to a blacksmith, or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless we want to go through the old-fashioned way like the cultists did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The old-fashioned way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't Plane Shift unless we alter the necklace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we have enough necklaces that we could just jump through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might take a little bit of damage on the way through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a bajillion health points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you hold your breath for-- (whispering) what's higher than ten?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't all you bitches just hop in the Bag of Holding, I jump through, take all the damage for us, and then you just (popping sounds) pop right back out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can think of many reasons why that's probably not a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What could it possibly be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not designed to sustain life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you ever been in one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very specifically not, because things die in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, think of all the things you've pulled out of there that look like sloppy joes, when they didn't look like that going in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's put something living inside of there and wait ten seconds and then take it out and see if it's still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we throw a dog in there--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So if it breathes, it will die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's no air, I don't think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it's ten seconds and it's not knowing to hold its breath, it will come out alive, still.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want to do CPR, whatever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if the things inside take the damage even if they are in the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should find out. Are you going in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not a magic you want to be messing around with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet it's not going to be that bad of a deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is the fantasy equivalent of locking yourself in a refrigerator.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just wanted to put it out there if you wanted to live on the edge of life, but no, we'll just do it the boring way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel comfortable with the level of risk-taking of jumping into a giant sphere that crushes anything it touches.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's definitely a large amount of risk-taking already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody tell if this plate is cursed? Can you tell if something's cursed, bro?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the armor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you tell if something is cursed, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could try. Can I check it out and see if it's cursed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a face that says, I'm giving you nothing. (groans) Garlic chicken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross. Were you the one burping earlier, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I blew it that way, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but somebody burped in the first half of the game, and it was foul.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's probably me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Careful where you aim that. You might break a camera.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go. Let's move!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out if this plate mail is cursed or not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who the fuck cares? We're going to a cursed place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but it's so we can put it on somebody here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's grab a bit of funds. Do we have the group funds, as well? We have access to the group funds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think one plate armor's going to do anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan's back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guess who's back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Do we want to do a Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 'cause what if something's waiting for us on the other side?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if nothing's waiting for us on the other side? Because now we're down one Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but what if there is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got a mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then we dive into the mansion and we have a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to waste a fucking minute. We've got to protect Scanlan for a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to be okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm with your beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think over-cautious. Even when jumping into the depths of the undead, there's such a thing as over-cautious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go down to the ziggurat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm putting the-- as I hit the microphone. Do not touch your microphone when you put on your necklace. I'm putting on my necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll put on my necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each of you don one of the symbols?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need to put on the robes, too, that we found?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck the robes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want them to see me coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Do you want the robes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't feel strongly about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we put on the robes, we've got to pull out an eyeball each, too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're already there? We're standing at the ball?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going down? Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going down to the ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You find your way down into the subterranean tunnels beneath Whitestone, winding through the caverns until you enter the chamber that contains the ziggurat where you initially faced off with the Briarwoods. As you climb to the top, there before you, you see standing in all of its glory, the black, as you've called it, spinning orb of death. Approximately that large now, and it's this dark void, that as you get close, it has this weird vibration to it. And there it is, suspended about four feet off the ground at the top of this ziggurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get close to it and put the necklace near it without touching it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You put the necklace near it, and you watch as the sphere, this weird grayish aura around it begins to emanate faintly, almost like the closer it gets, the brighter this weird gray aura tends to get and the wider it grows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That seems promising.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm right behind you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me. (whoosh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth reaches for Vax right as he goes in. Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use my first Luck of the day. Wasn't that bad, but it's an important roll. That's better. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh Jesus, that's so many dice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) I thought we bamfed into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He twitched again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just that? That's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know that. You just saw him vanish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm game. I'll go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody going in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Everyone, make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine. No, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of necrotic damage. 11 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of necrotic damage. 22 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A jagged monolith that exudes ancient hatred, encircled by dozens of dark, winged beasts that watch over the dreary skies. Who here is proficient in history?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doomed to repeat it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I have other qualities, history was not my forefront. I know Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somewhere, Taryon is reading a history book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you being a bard, you pick up information in passing. With disadvantage, each of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a bad sign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no inclination of where you stand or what's before you. All you know is you stand now on the cold plane of the Shadowfell, the echo of the Prime Material.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our notes on the Shadowfell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we consult the Rand McNally?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Rand McNally guide, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're welcome to. Just so you guys know, you are all standing out in the middle of the open, on this large stone platform looking down in the center of this giant city--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are things that are moving below. I see them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the ziggurat is above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no ziggurat. There is a large, black spire, but that's in the center of the city maybe two miles off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we hop down, I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are buildings around, so are we in the middle of a field, a plain, badlands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are buildings. You see two structures maybe 50 or 60 feet from you on each side, and then going forward, from your current position, it leads right into the city. So this structure is on the outskirts. It's right on the perimeter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any other orbs around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance and, in the faint gray sky above you, around the glowing white-gray orb this side of the siphon, you see a very, very faint aura of bluish-purple that is weaving into a thread, a rope almost, various strands that knot and twist to form a cord, a very barely visible cord that just drifts up towards the very top of that tower for miles. And there at the top of the tower, you see a vibrant, sparking, pulsing, purple glow. And from there, you can see two other distant strands that arc off into the very faint other edges across, triangulating around the other sides of the outskirts of this ancient city. You see the faint, glowing white-gray pulse of two other siphons affixed to two other platforms, all these strands converging at the top of the tower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Before we get to it, can I cast Bless on his bullets so I can give them back to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not very long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. There's a difference between casting a spell and enchanting something. It's a loose enchantment to Bless the ammunition. That takes a while to focus on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine it'll take a few days when it's done.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When it's done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't expect us to be in and out of here, I think this is going to take some time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'd rather enchant them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The structures to our left and our right, are they solid, do they have focus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're solid, they're stone buildings, they're homes, though plain and cracked. There are sections of wall missing in places. As you look about the grounds here, and you know this because you've ransacked and been responsible for the ransacking... or the rubble of Westruun. But this city appears to have been, some time long ago, under siege. You see signs of battle, you see impact, you see roofs that were burned and now lie as just black husks. This area has seen warfare long ago and the signs of it are old and it looks like the signs of life that exist in this space, the movement you see of figures in the distance wandering through the streets, there's no immediate threat to this city, but you get the sense just looking out that something big happened here a long time ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any of you with the eyes, can you see what that is up in the air?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I also want to look and see what the fuck kind of creatures it is that are moving around in the city. But I want to see what kind of creatures are flying around as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adding plus ten to your roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh shit, you rolled bad, yo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So, to stay stealthed, you have to find some place to be stealthy. You're not stealthing out in the middle of nowhere. Where are you going to find--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Towards the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those buildings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we temporarily staying put and talking shit out or are we going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The building on the left, I'd say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like hide behind something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys dart off to the left. It appears to have once been a two-story structure, but the upper level has since collapsed and part of it is falling into the bottom floor. As you begin to approach the doorway on the inside, Vex'ahlia, you hear what sounds like a faint crunching sound on the inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (nervous laughter) What the fuck? Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) What's the matter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) There's something in this building. (louder) Are there windows on the building, at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are. There is one window on your side, and the doorway around the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Peek in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll look in the window with my 40 stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Simple, basic. This is not an extravagantly decorated space. Built for function, more than anything. But moving amidst the shadow, you see what appears to be a humanoid creature of pale gray skin, elongated limbs, long, clawed fingers. Bald head, pointed, hooked ears, and what looks to be slightly broken, jagged, yellow, elongated teeth in this jaw, as it's currently munching on what looks to be a small furred rodent of some kind. (crunching)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is probably redundant, but I will Divine Sense undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is very undead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I sense, see, hear anything besides this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the radius?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (leaping noises) Just leaping from rooftop to rooftop. As you're watching that leap, another movement catches your eye, and you see another one about three blocks down. You can see, there are at least a handful of these creatures stalking through the ruins, leaping from building to building, from floor to floor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What was it eating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A small, furred creature. You didn't get a good look at it. You got a fair look at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was an otter. I love otters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, so does the creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would there be otters in the Shadowfell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's something you didn't know about otters, Laura.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They love holding hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like any of those scary creatures are around each other, or are they avoiding each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell at this distance. You're so far out of the city. You've only been able to notice a few shapes from this distance. You'd probably have to get in a little closer and spend some time watching their behavior to pick that up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to crouch down by this dead rodent. Do I sense the Queen, more or less, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You close your eyes for a second. No. None.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pop my head back out the door, and looking at the ground, is there any semblance of a sewer system or a runoff grate or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus. Yeah, bitch. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! Get your head back inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's things flying around out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm keeping a lookout.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to crawl up the wall to the second floor to see what's up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go up the side and step over onto the rubble, you see a large, broken, what was once the floor of the top floor that slid into this giant decline, this slide of rubble, if you will. At the top, you can see what looks to be a broken weapon rack that is empty. No weapons on it, but you get the sense that this small structure was a perimeter tower outpost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been cleaned out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no sign of anybody who used to be here? Nothing of value, nothing of interest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in the structure, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to have to move deeper in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I make us all ghoulie?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we notice anything strange about the little necklaces that we're wearing now that we're in this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing at the moment, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, you feeling good about your decision to come with us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is terrible. I haven't had this much fun in a long time. Let's go do it. I'll cast Seeming on us and make us all gray, pointy-eared, little Nosferatu-vampirey things, I suppose. Did I see the thing that skittered out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very briefly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen other undead things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can make something that looks undead-adjacent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. My guy will look more like the Meat Man in undead form, but otherwise, everyone's normal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want straggly, but still a braid. Really nasty, straggly hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your ear's half off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I definitely want an eyeball hanging out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Straight hole right through the head. No jaw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What do you guys do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should probably try to observe the things that are flying around the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slowly make our way to the town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Observe. Still try to avoid any of those scary creatures, but see if they avoid each other as we look at them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Super slow, super careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should stagger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, those things were speedy. Be normal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll walk like this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a performance check. No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they were looking at weapons racks and doing stuff like that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You make it sound so tawdry. Carry on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they were doing that, I pull Vax aside. I grab him--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get married.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it. Scanlan's back. Listen, you can't die, and I don't know what's going on in your head, or what you're thinking, but I feel like it's not good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm the best I've ever been. Don't worry about me. Worry about us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has the Raven Queen spoken to you at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Recently? Down here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not since we got here, no, but recently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need you with us. Not with her. I need you with us, and with me. So let me do this. And I'm going to burn my 9th-level spell and cast Foresight on Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, Foresight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one goes to nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is Foresight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck it up, man. It's my 9th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the next eight hours, not concentration, you can't be surprised. You have advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws, and other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can see just in the future. Three seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys, let's go shopping! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I raise my blood axe...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I going to die in three seconds? Am I going to die in three seconds? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make our way into town. Quietly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Within the next eight hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like Vax should lead the party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so are you stealthing through?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still being stealthy, but yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking cool, but stealthing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We look so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not doing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt's like, I will kill you all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not scattered, mindless. There is some will or direction to their movements. You see them wearing ornate armor with designs and symbols on them that look old and tarnished and scratched.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they moving like troops or is each individual following its own...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some are moving as troops, and occasionally you see an individual wander off, but they're just sort of walking around and scanning. I'm going to have Scanlan, you roll a history check, and Pike, roll a religion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17. Oh! You know what, seems important, I will inspire myself. Can I do that? I haven't done this in so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, add a d12 to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got to get the dust off, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many of these bodies, these undead wandering the city, seem to have been soldiers that fell in whatever battle that once besieged this city, and many bear the mark of Pelor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, the Chained--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Chained Oblivion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Chained Oblivion, there was a fight between.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was, but that was on the Prime Material, and that was in the vicinity of the Alabaster Sierras.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That mark couldn't have ended up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was the Shadowfell always the Shadowfell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe this city was taken somewhere else or something. Transported here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this city look like Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. None of the buildings, the structures, resemble Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any architecture that I, or anyone, notices, like from a region of where we've been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mid-century modern, mostly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, lot of Ikea. No, but you do get the sense-- some of the architecture here does resemble elements of some architecture designs that remind you of Wildemount.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, we should have brought Tary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But, like, old Wildemount. Like, no modern structures, definitely from centuries back. As you continue to wander and keep your eyes out, you occasionally hear the distant (creature shrieking). You watch as the (wings flapping) winged, dark beasts are circling overhead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we recognize them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never seen anything like it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not seen anything like these before. Black as night against the gray sky. From this distance, you make out no details in their bodies. It's almost like a moving shadow above you. Wherever light would hit to give you some sense of structure, it's just absence, void. It's just a flying shadow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there any buildings that have enough structure to them where it feels like there might be things inside that have been relatively unmolested at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. I mean, there are some buildings that look like they have some structure, and the further into the city you get, the more you see that this becomes a little less destroyed. But you begin to see some figures moving that are not armored undead, not zombies, and not any of these quick-moving creatures. You see three figures walking back towards the orb where you guys came from in the same black cult robes, hoods off. They would appear to be human.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But they're cultists.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they're cultists.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't look like they're afraid of walking around?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what's their demeanor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just walking through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far are they from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 100 feet up. A little further than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Coming our way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coming your way towards the sphere where you guys were.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe that's what we need to look like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cover and ambush?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or watch, see what they're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kill two, keep one to question?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many are there, three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, can we even kill people here? Will they die?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. But do we watch, see what they do with the sphere first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's cut them off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could be bait. Then you could come ambush them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's watch for a moment longer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Find cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So what do you guys do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going into the building.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm following them, just subtly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let the twins go ahead first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, I need you both individually to roll stealth as you tail behind them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're staying put and they're walking off somewhere else? How are we going to see what's going to happen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were walking towards us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cultists are basically walking past you guys, going the opposite direction of where you were traveling, and both the twins just vanish from sight. You're like, "Well what if-- Gone again." You guys pace behind them, jumping from alley to alley. Occasionally they'll stop and do a walk over. There's not a sense of paranoia, but they're very watchful. Their attire, while still cult robes, is a little more intricately adorned, and you see the one in the front is carrying a hanging lantern that gives off this weird smoke behind it, like a censer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A censer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, like a Catholic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But it gives off this faint glow, and they walk and make their way slowly outside of the city towards the pillar where the orb is. And they just look around it, walk over to the few buildings to the side, divide a little bit to a perimeter, reconvene at the base of the orb, and begin making their way back to the center of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything else around? Should we kill them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All three? Take one? Kill two, leave one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can ambush them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get ready for an ambush.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When they walk by the house, push them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When they walk past you guys, we'll attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I put someone out there to confuse them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. When we go, follow suit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Grasping Vine one into the building, right into Grog's hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait until we attack them first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you aiming at two different ones? Same one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two different ones. And it's an automatic...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an automatic crit if you hit, and you have advantage on the hit because they don't see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20. Not that it matters, because I already got a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But still, it's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage, both of you, doubling your weapon die damage and your sneak attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bramble shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's three of them, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three of them, yes... You also double the bramble shot damage because it's a crit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, look, we're killing things! Well, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Incapacitating, at the very least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit, dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 85 damage. Rogues, man. It's what they do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The head is cleaved from the body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 56 for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was Kima and Allura on a mission. They're dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the three of them walk, the two on the outside both, at the same time, (impacts), crumple. No noise, just fall to their knees, face down on the ground, unmoving. The one in the center that's holding the censer turns and looks back and sees--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go (whoosh) and Grasping Vine him, and throw him right into Grog's hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't kill him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if he's successfully thrown, I just cover his mouth and grab the back of his head and squeeze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which mouth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ew, God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fail. That's right, because 21. So as soon as he turns around, out of one of the cracks in the stonework nearby, you can see some dry, grass-like gray brush. There is what appears to be some faint hints of local plant life, but it all looks like gray, dry grass. Or, you know after a morning freeze, when you see elements of a field that have that weird, textured, almost water plant look to it? It's clusters of that, but curled. And one of those whips out with this one, long, grayish, almost fleshy-looking vine that wraps around it and yanks it inside the house. (grunt) Gets yanked in. Grog, you catch him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cover his mouth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like clockwork.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an athletics check, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's a million. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He struggles against your grasp, and it's nothing. It's like holding a baby in your arms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, will you give him a reminder not to move?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes, this will be fun. I take out a small, three-inch steel ball. I look him right in the eye, and go, Manners. And I toss the steel ball at our friend. The iron bands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What does he have to save on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually make a ranged attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a ranged attack roll. d20 plus your dexterity. You have advantage because he's currently restrained by Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Makes me feel better. Thank God. That's still fine. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you chuck it the three feet, it impacts, and you watch as the orb swells and expands, and all of these chain-like plates of dark, reddish iron metal wrap around him, constraining his hands, his legs, and locking him into place around his jaw and his head and his mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he still talk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, when I take my hand off his mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing will allow him to talk. I believe this thing has a...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a little slit that you can remove to the side.
