lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got a gimp hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All good magical items do, Liam. That's what you call an artifact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give him a second to sit and I wait until we're all inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys both attacked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pull the bodies inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First make a stealth check, because you both exposed yourselves with the attack, and there are creatures overhead shrieking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage. He has advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus Pass Without Trace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 37, that's kind of low for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't seem to take notice. You drop back into the building, and there you see your quarry now bolted to himself through a series of dark iron metal plates.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Our quarry, does he have two eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not have both eyes. Left eye is missing. You see him now. This is a man in his mid-40s, salt and pepper hair, seems to be an unkempt beard around his chin. Hair is maybe about ear-length, a little tattered now since he's been roughed up and manhandled a bit. His skin's a bit yellowed, a little jaundiced. You get the sense he's probably been living here for quite some time, and he doesn't look healthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the thing that was making the smoke and bring it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smell is awful. It's hard to differentiate from the general smell of decay and dust that this entire realm seems to be suffused with, but the smoke that billows off of this is like fresh putrescence, mixed with a very, very strong charcoal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This may be how they move freely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I'm thinking. We hide the bodies. We'll bring the bodies inside, too, so that nobody sees them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Press him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I unlock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was nasty, it was real good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Terrible. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You unlock, and he just goes (laughs) "I don't have to tell you anything."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I punch him in the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pry and poke all you want."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I punch him in the mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Think you can give him back his eye?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to use a carrot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's the stick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have Regenerate with you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Separate him from his god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put my hand over his eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't flinch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you ready to have your eye back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll just pluck it right back out."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you can't. Because you're just going to stay in these binds forever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or Grog will pull your arms off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do your worst."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's not scared of pain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just ask him some questions before the fun begins. Let's see what he answers with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know Delilah Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Even if I perish, I die with the comfort of knowing that you'll perish soon after. That is the "comfort in the Whispered One."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you knowingly came here. You are both foolish and simple."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's just me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you said you have questions."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's flying around in the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sentinels."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sentinels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is what they are for us, but they are known more formally as Gloom Stalkers."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gloom Stalkers. That is a great name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are hungry. Ever hungry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They also look fearsome. Do people cower before them in their presence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll bet. I am easily startled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are you from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It does not matter. The past means nothing when you give up your secrets."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've come through the Wildemount one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shakes his head. "You will get no information from me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Can I have a try? You've got one eye, right? Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the gaping socket, and as he goes to blink one eye, you can see the marking on the inside, it looks like it was burned out, so you watch the outer edge of the flesh and muscle twitch whenever he blinks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gross ocular muscles. I just want to make you feel good, man, so I'll just sing to you. I'll hold up my cone, and I'll sing, (singing) Just the two of us. You can't quit me if you tried. Just the two of us. Me and your eye. So I'll Dominate Person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is... That's an 11. All right. His grin glazes over and he goes...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you please tell us everything you know when we ask you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am from the outskirts of a far eastern Wildemount village named Zuvan. It was built on the "ruins of Orthanus. I was a poor man, but I found purpose."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you come through a ziggurat in Wildemount? And if so, where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I was taken with many others who had given themselves to the secrets of the "Undying King. I awoke here, mauled but living, and was inducted, and that was when he took my eye."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He. One of the acolytes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The flying things. Well, we know what they are now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do they do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the flying things have magical powers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know. They shriek, they eat, they watch. I do not mess with such terrible and "wonderful instruments."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How does he get through all the dead?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The smoke-making thing that you were carrying. What is it and how does it work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It protects those of us who are not as esteemed in the arts of necromancy to not be "bothered by the roving, long-dead soldiers of the last war on Thar Amphala."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The last war on Thar Amphala! What does that mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The last war on what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thar Amphala. Thar Amphala, the city built for the Whispered One, long ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's where we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who lives in the tower, Vecna? Is that where he is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just looks at you strangely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got to come from him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really good friend of his.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She really is, that's being rude. But who lives in the tower? Is it Vecna or Mistress Delilah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's where his essence has slowly reclaimed the space. He will live soon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but he's not back yet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Mistress Delilah. Where is she right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not seen her, but if she is not out, then perhaps the ritual is soon. She is probably "at the top of Entropis."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Entropis is the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That tower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The only tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What other alarms are there in the city that would detect outsiders?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What protections do you have on the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know the specifics. I am but a watcher on the outside of Thar Amphala."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't go in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not gone in since I gave my eye."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what are your people called? Your group, your cult?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are the Remnants."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's his purpose?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your job with the Remnants?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am to watch the outskirts of the city. I am to escort those who would bring various things "in preparation for the ritual."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What ritual? What is the ritual going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What will the ritual do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ritual is to restore him. To bring him, so that he can complete the main purpose. The "ritual of seeding."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just a farmer, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How does Delilah factor into it? What does she get out of it? What does she do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think he knows all of the intricacies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but he's probably promised them all something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What has Delilah promised you? What do you gain out of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When he, the Undying King, returns to this world, and we bring what we have gained, what we "have brought from the other plane, that seed will be taken to the ritual of the space."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What have they brought?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you bring something through the portal? What was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not understand the details, but for many months now, these siphons, they have been "building the seed. They have been preparing for his return. And from there, he will complete what "he started so long ago."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that shit's happening soon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When does the ritual begin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Soon. Things accelerate."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know we look different now, but if you had to pick one of us, which is the most handsome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be you, my friend."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can he take us safely to the tower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you escort us to the tower? Dominate Person has got to be wearing off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm checking the spell just to be sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a thing. We can at least get through town.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One minute. It's probably over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So by about now, after these questions have come through, his one eye blinks, and he goes, (grunt), "It matters not. He already knows you're here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I punch him in the temple again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes it. Stop giving him pleasure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I poke him in his remaining eyeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you? Roll a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A strength check? For some Jello?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh God. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shriek of pain)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I close the mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a smear of crimson down his face as the other eye has just been turned to paste.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, we're terrible people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, what was that? It matters not? Oh, are you going to be rewarded? Yeah. How many middle fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should put him out of his misery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? I like misery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if we just release him into the city without his censer...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Squish the bug, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no. If we send him away from us, maybe one of those things will find him and we'll have a clearer path.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's yelling. He'll make all sorts of sound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if we send him away from us and then we go the other way. He's a human distraction!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't need a distraction, we need quiet at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And those things, we don't know if they could alert back if they saw something fishy like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll release him and you do your business, all right? Manners.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mechanical clicking) It all unfolds and returns into the sphere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. It's programmable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we let you back out so you can find your way back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do your worst."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (crack)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a sickening snap, you can hear as the spinal column is severed at the base of the neck, and he goes limp in Grog's grasp.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grab his necklace in case we need another one for some reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we grab any cloaks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grab the necklaces and the cloaks and the censer. All three of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, he has almost nothing on him but the censer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No necklace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has-- Actually, no, he would not have one of the necklaces. Because he does not...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Travel through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a symbol, a similar symbol, but it's much smaller, more just a basic holy symbol of some kind. Same shape, but it doesn't have the same thick iron presentation as the ones that you guys encountered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a holy symbol to Vecna that we took off of somebody in the original ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and that is the same symbol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in an ancient city. Are there the remains of furniture in here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to take a nap or a cozy sit-down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I want to shove him in a closet or wrap him up in something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm putting him in the Bag of Holding as you're talking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't keep everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anybody see any-- Never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything of interest in this building, since we have a moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to investigate, too, because I was looking for furniture.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Investigation... 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do find some furniture. Most of it's very basic, tables, maybe a couple chairs, a couple of cots that are mainly wood boards with a thin cushion on it. The existence here was not to be-- It's a very plain city of worship. You can see everything was built here to gather worshipers, to gather the Remnants, or whatever they were called before, the last time that Vecna fell and the city was assaulted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so this is all worse than Fallout Three at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on par with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: PlayStation Three graphics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we make our way towards the spire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now, still under the guise of various undead, holding a wandering burning censer procured from the now-dead, eye-popped corpse of a wandering cultist, you slowly make your way deeper into the city of Thar Amphala, towards the tower of Entropis, where seemingly the cult of the Remnant are attempting to bring Vecna back to physical form for an even greater ritual thereafter. And that's where we'll finish tonight's episode. We'll return next week to pick up from there, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the best setup ever!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So happy. I know! I get to touch people's hands!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dorks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, we're such huge nerds. This feels so much like the home game, it makes me happy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Serious deja vu.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All it needs is honey and brie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could put food out in front of us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next week, pajamas and mimosas. What better way to celebrate a Vecna arc in the Shadowfell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bring your dog to work day!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: PJ's, mimosas, and very old puppies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Charlie? Can Charlie come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's necessary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charlie can run Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the meantime, I want to tell you all, I love you very much. Happy 101st episode. And is it Thursday yet? Good night, guys! [art]
